title: Ambulance bogged in sand, makeshift ICU unit on beach, weeping paramedic; the grim reality of Australia's Great White crisis, “'(The surfer) was shouting 'help me' — people were trying to get him out to the shore!”
content:
1. Ambulance bogged in sand, makeshift ICU unit on beach, weeping paramedic; the grim reality of Australia's Great White crisis, “'(The surfer) was shouting 'help me' — people were trying to get him out to the shore!”  BeachGrit
  2. Surfer dies in shark attack off Australian beach  CNN
  3. Surfer fatally bit by shark off Australia coast  WSB Atlanta
  4. Shark attack at Emerald Beach, first responder talks of shocking scenes in the water  Daily Telegraph
  5. Surfer fatally bitten by shark off Australia's east coast  Yahoo! Voices
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 砂に埋もれた救急車、ビーチに設置された仮設のICUユニット、泣き叫ぶ救急隊員、オーストラリアのホオジロザメの危機の厳しい現実、「『（サーファーが）『助けてくれ』と叫んでいた。
救护车陷在沙子里，海滩上的临时ICU病房，哭泣的护理人员；澳大利亚大白危机的严峻现实。"'（冲浪者）在喊'救我'--人们试图把他弄到岸边！"
救護車陷在沙子裏，海灘上的臨時ICU病房，哭泣的護理人員；澳大利亞大白危機的嚴峻現實。"'（衝浪者）在喊'救我'--人們試圖把他弄到岸邊！"
